content.detailedDescription: Tonight was the third time this month that i have witnessed an orange star-like or planetoid-like object cruising the skies of saratoga county between the hours of 9:30 -10:30 pm.  tonight at 9:57 pm as i was returning home, i exited from the car and heard an aircraft/jet which sounded to be at a lower than normal elevation, as i looked up and focused on the jet, i noticed that it was tracking an orange glowing star-like object that was golf ball sized from the ground.  the speed of the jet seemed to be slower than usual and it tracked the ufo keeping a consistent distance at what appeared to be 12" from my perspective.  they traveled in a straight path from south to north running slightly west of the northway i87. i was reaching for my phone to take a video but did not have the time to get the capture because i didn't want to take my eyes off the event, it was over within several seconds.  i saw the same orange ufo traveling north to south at approx 9:40 pm two weeks earlier, and after posting a video to fb, 2 other people contacted me and one had seen it in saratoga springs on south broadway and another in ballston spa.  the night before this sighting, i caught a quick glimpse of a sun-like whitish gold large sphere stationary low in the sky hovering above and overpass partially behind some pines, i was traveling in a car and could not stop to investigate.
content.summary: Orange glowing star-like object tracked by jet at low speed

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting occurred on a summer night from my home which is out of town away from city lights, also the home is located with a high (elevation) vantage point allowing clear view of the west, north, and east night sky. recently, within the last three years i have regularly witnessed strange red and blue flashing spheres in a low hover around the helena, mt valley horizon line...Mostly to the north and west. many locals who have seen the lights attribute the observances to a local montana national guard helicopter unit's night maneuvers. however, i have never seen helicopters hover stationary for so long and certainly have never seen one emit a spiral (spark like) light. the spiral light was like a 4th of july sparkler pinwheel. (like the kind that is attached to an object like a fence and allowed to spin from the propulsion of the gun powder/sparks)

due to a previous encounter during my lifetime i often observe the night sky. for this reason, and as mentioned i recently noticed the reoccurring lights (the aforementioned objects) and it has become a pass time of mine to look at the horizon late at night to see if the objects are observable. on the night of this sighting there were four other witnesses. i was checking the sky the night the spiral was seen, and several house guests along with two other family members witnessed the object which i had identified in the night sky to the northwest of our location. from our viewpoint the object pulsated with red and blue lights and was observed for several minutes when two aircraft approached the object's location from the north and east...Moving right to left across the sky above the silhouette of the ridge-line of the surrounding mountains. (these craft were assumed to be usaf fighter jets from malmstrom afb in great falls, mt and the planes came specifically from the location of the base; north and east ) when the planes got close (distance unknown) to the object it emitted a spiraling pinwheel of sparking lights and instantaneously shot straight up in the air. none of the witnesses seem to be able to recall where the airplanes went after the object departed because we were were all enthralled about witnessing the spiral.  

this is the second direct close ufo observation of my lifetime. my first encounter occurred as a child while traveling on a very isolated western montana highway in the early 1970's. during that encounter, a craft traveled over my family's car and a brilliant white light (like none i have ever seen since) lit up our vehicle and and much of the surrounding forrest. (like daylight and it was late in the evening) two of my family members directly witnessed the craft that evening as they gazed upward out of the window of the car in which we were traveling. this sighting was witnessed in the early 1970's, i believe 1973, and was well documented at the time in the region as being seen by many throughout the state of montana. the craft in that incident was described as very large cigar shaped and traveling from west to east.
content.summary: Rotating lights were witnessed to the north of witness location, object witnessed by 4 people, object emitted spiral pinwheel when approached by usaf planes and bolted upward.

content.detailedDescription:
April, 2008. i was taking my sons to their moms house. i was east bound on us-12. when i came up and over the hill i noticed bright blue lights behind a local bar. i slowed down, wondering if they had a concert.  but seen no stage. i passed the bar and realized it was over the horse stable just behind the bar. i pulled in the drive. i asked the boys if they see it too. i was in disbelief.  they asked what it was then begged me to leave.
i looked at the time on my dash and turned everything off in the car. i rolled diwn the windows to listen.  no sound. it just hovered there. no pitching or fluctuations.
i couldn't even see a outline. just 6-8 large blue lights spreading out from the center.And in the center was a golden orange semi-globe light.
i decided i was gonna step out and walk to it.
as soon as i opened the door, it started to move north west .
i followed it in my car for about three minutes and realized i was almost on empty and had to get the boys home.  to this day, we still talk about it.
and neither of us has ever seen a picture that looks like what we seen.
content.summary: Blue lights withe a golden orange light in the middle

content.detailedDescription: My son and i was in my back yard at night looking at the stars when we saw a flying object that we thought was a plain but was a little high to be a plain.It stopped in mid air next to a star we thought .After a minute there were two objects flying together.Then they both changed direction then they both went out of sight.
content.summary: My son an i was outside in my back yard when we noticed pretty the stars looked when all of a sudden a star like lite started to move and about ten seconds later it stopped next to another light and a minute later two light began to move together .

content.detailedDescription: Came home from work and was standing in front of my house talking to roommate that was on porch. i heard a small cessna plane flying by behind the house and looked up and saw a perfectly round sphere, metallic white flying by i asked my roommate if he saw it and he said no and looked at me like i was nuts. when i saw the little plane turn around and fallow it then i new i wasn't crazy. no sound moving perfectly straight, going a little faster the cessna. going towards mexico.I could see that there were two people in the plane and this ball was a bit lower and closer to me then the plane. thats it.
content.summary: White metalic ball

content.detailedDescription: I was coming down my driveway from my mailbox this night and always i look up and caught this object, very low, moving very fast ,but was very bright and had a blue crescent glow in front of it.I observed it for at least 4 seconds because i caught it from horizon to horizon until it vanished. i was thinking this is not a falling star,because it was much larger than those which we all have seen from time to time.It was very straight in its flight path,it went directly over my house and gave me a very weird static feeling,almost like i heard it.But can`t be for sure.After it was over i had a strange feeling i just saw something that i maybe shouldn`t have seen.Weird!!  i think i really need to tell someone so they can tell me maybe what i have seen. i would like an explaination and would like to talk with someone about this.Thanks
content.summary: Noticed object moving very fast at low altitude  and saw it the whole time until it went out of site

content.detailedDescription:
A few years ago while doing family research on the internet i ran across a newspaper article that was a story of many people who had observed in the sky an object that hovered and flew. to the best of my recollection i think they described it as cigar shaped.
the thing that struck me about this is that it predated any human flying objects. i don't recall the date but it was sometime in the second half of the 1800's.
i was researching a family named mclain. i showed it to my wife at the time but didn't mention to anyone else. the reason i'm reporting this is to suggest a search of old pre-modern newspapers for this or similar observations. these observations it would seem would lend credibility to modern sightings.
you might have the ability to word search many old newspaper articles using words like flying. in my case i remember it was a louisiana newspaper. 
you should disregard the dates i put on your form. i don't remember the date and just needed to satisfy the document requirements to submit it.
content.summary: Craft observed hovering and flying

content.detailedDescription:
Standing in the backyard i just happened to look up.  i believe i looked up because of the heavy airplane traffic that we've been experiencing over the house due to runway changes at o'hare airport lately. i noticed on the east horizon a solid yet fuzzy object flying very fast westerly.  the object was very high up (satellite height) but still appeared about the size of a basketball. i immediately pointed it out to my roommate who witnessed the entire event with me.

the object looked sort of like an egg in a frying pan, yellowish oval with a dark center spot.  it flew from horizon to horizon in approximately 1 to 2 minutes.  as it approached the west horizon, it started to zig zag sharply while still heading in the same direction and then paused briefly, then continued in a straight flight pattern. it looked as if it flew past the earth, not orbiting the earth.  about 30 seconds later, an exact duplicate flew over but was a bit smaller, looking like it had more altitude.  the second object flew straight, from and to the same direction, but this one did not pause or hesitate.  they both were flying at a very fast rate of speed, as i have seen satellites orbiting the earth when doing night fishing on minnesota lakes, these were definitely not satellites, or high flying aircraft.

neither one of us had or have any idea what these objects were.  i've never seen anything like this in the sky before.  i was very excited to finally witness what i've only heard about through mufon and its tv shows. after 50 years of looking toward the sky... this was simply an amazing sight!!
content.summary: Looked sort of like large eggs in a frying pan

content.detailedDescription: A big light in the sky and was asked what to do i told her to call the police and she did they felt it was a ufo there was two officers with us they where there about 45 minutes then had to leave the ufo real slow left and went told the blue mountain told the river at blink out and was gone from sight the ufo was disk shape with a lot of colors of lights one on each would get real bright red one end and blue at the other end it was not of this world i later found do to its size it was seen  in cumberland county and other county's from what i was told there was a ufo sighting on the monday before this over the school it was red and blue bear shape and went real fast up in the  sky date on that one o8/22/2o14 at 9:00 pm don't know who all saw just 3 people toward it almost hit a building people are asking me whats going on with the sightings this is not normal whats that tell you. the search program came to my door and we talked about the sighting until i talk to some from mufon and show them where it happen words don't me a thing again what we saw was a ufo nothing other and the police are staying with the same report that was the best thing i did was have her call the police.Sorry about the part of the report with words running together i had ear surgery thanks for understanding. end of report.
content.summary: A big ufo with alot of lights pot hole lightspolicecalled1owitnesisbineontv

content.detailedDescription:
The time was after midnight, crystal clear sky. full moon, could see stars almost on the horizon. i was traveling west from el paso to southern california- i stopped at the side of the road, and stood on the mound between the road and the desert [behind me, to the north].  

i observed the craft directly overhead slightly to the west...About at zenith.  
craft was stationary (still) and made no sound, had a circular array of lights - alternating red and blue (a cobalt blue)
craft seemed to be oval however if it was tilted it could have been circular and seemed to me to be oval from the ground.

i could not determine the size because i didn't know its altitude. 

the craft moved ever so slightly and very slowly [as though positioning itself] from north back to south, then became stationary. 

in an instant the craft disappeared to the east [over mountains about 18 to 20 miles away] this took about 3 to 4 seconds. i estimated it was doing about mach 10. 

it left a wispy light blue contrail behind it's path, and as i waited for a sound or a shock wave, there was none.

it looked to clear the mountains [estimated at 6k feet by a few thousand feet so i guessed that it was at about 8,000 feet when it was above me. 

personally, i was a member of flight control [nasa houston, building 30} and had been involved in over 20 rocket launches in my professional life. america had absolutely no technology to come even close to meeting this observed performance at that time. 

privately, i didn't discuss it for a very long time, for obvious reasons.I also believe that what our citizens observe in the form of ufos is absolutely none of the federal government's business, and between you and i, we should keep it to ourselves, not even inform them....Better for us to inform private organizations and the press than to turn our information over to 'liars central' in washington. 

that was the only observation i ever made but i am a qualified observer, and so i assure you, the technology was not from this planet.
content.summary: Unknown craft at altitude went from zero to mach 10 in a directed path and made no sound

content.detailedDescription:
While flying from harrisburg, pa to atlanta airport i looked east out the window and saw a bright ball of light with a trail.  the ball of light was at the end / bottom of the trail.  the light was pulsating at a slow rate but was very bright and noticeable.
not sure if it was a sun beam.  there were a few clouds in the sky.  the sun had just risen about 45 min earlier.After enlarging the photo, i notiiced an object below and to the left of the ball of light.
content.summary: Flight from harrisburg, pa to atlanta airport

content.detailedDescription:
Around 11pm the end of june first of july i was sitting outside a cabin at the vacation resort i worked at. i was sitting in a folding chair looking up at the stars. 

i was looking to the east and saw two lights moving slowly towards my position. the lights appeared to be the same brightness as the stars. 

i first thought they were running lights on a helicopter. there had been a lot of helicopter traffic from the new boyscout camp. there is also a new secret military base on the back side of the boyscout camp.

as i saw the lights coming closer it was dead silent. there was no sound of rotors. there was no sound at all. the front light moved on a steady course from east to west. the trailing light moved left and right. back and forth before falling into line behind the front light. the lights began to slow some as they went directly overhead. as they passed above me i could see wispy light clouds above the lights and what appeared to be a rectangular outline of a transparent aircraft. i could see right through the aircraft but could still see that it was an object. as it moved in a westerly direction it picked up speed rapidly. not out of this world fast. but fast enough that it could not have been a helicopter, balloon, or blimp. there were no wings so it was no plane. 

i remember thinking "i just saw a ufo". i wasn't sure what to do. the entire event only lasted about a minute. after 12 years in the army and a couple of deployments around the world i have seen a lot of strange and different things. but i have never seen any military aircraft that acted like this craft.

the aircraft moved off peacefully and quietly to the west
content.summary: I saw a ufo pass overhead. it was almost transparent with a visible outline.

content.detailedDescription: I'm a little confused. if the government is trying to cover up ufo sightings and the men in black truly exist and visit people and threaten them then why would mufon be allowed to present these events on the television . i have seen a ufo in sedona and know that they exist but i wonder if the government is allowing these kinds of shows on tv for a reason. is it to misguide us or to slowly prepare us?  why would the government even allow mufon or any of the other ufo shows be on the television if there is such a strong men in black threatening presence. is this a slow and steady feeding to the public to prepare them for the truth about what our government knows by the government?
content.summary: Looked up. saw a boomerang shaped ufo that hovered and then just disappeared

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were out watching stars with binoculers and telescope we saw bright lights with different colored lights hovering around and smaller lights flashing the bigger objects with a bright white lights we did not know what they were at first we thought they were stars on till they started moving a lot you could see them move side ways and see some of the objects were disc shaped and some were round and some were triangular shaped they moved slow and some times stayed still rise lower i told my wife i was going to flash it first with bright light we got nothing then we flashed it with red lazer light and it flased us back with a red lazer light right at us and since that nite they are out every nite and more have seemed to appear every nite it has really made me a little scared and wounder why they are here they stay around for hours they go away close to day brake i wish some one eles would come and check them out
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Lights shining flashing each othet

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Ok we were leaving a friends house on minnehaha street an my buddy spotted something in the sky it was small an hard to spot but when you did it was very clearly something just sitting there in the sky dead still early still we watched a time an pointed it out to a group of people sitting on there porch an they came out to the street an seen it so after a bit i got in the car an drove home about nine or ten blocks got my wife out an pointed out to her but then seen a second one moving it look to have a long antenna looking thing on top one side an bottom it sort of moved along slowly an lost it in a cloud the other seem to start moving strait up till it was gone we looked at it with binoculars i could see a shadow on part of it sort of like a egg shape but not really like you take part out of middle of the egg an put the ends together an it was way off the binoculars were shaky looking at it lots of witnesses though i guess that's about it
content.summary: Seen something dead still way  up in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was in a back yard  waiting for two dogs to finish business and  looked up and  saw in the nw sky a triangle formation that was stationary.  the right base point flashed/twinkled white red blue..They were some distance off. it seemed to be a perfect triangle...Base was long, guessing over 5 miles apart...Apex point was about 1/3   over center.. the base line of the triangle  was  parallel to the horizon. the  apex  was above the horizon. i watched the formation for about 20 minutes.  the right 'point' blinked/flashed white to red to blue to white. the flash happened three times.
content.summary: Observed what appeared to be 3  stars in an obtuse  triangle right point flashed/twinkled  white red blue

content.detailedDescription: My friend was looking at night sky . i was spending night with her at  north me woods check point.She yelled look out the window. i did but didn't see anything right away. then i saw it .A star looking object. it would just free fall then stay stationary for 5 mins at a time or so. it would move to the right of the tree  hover then back to the left very fast. it went back to the right again. i went outside in the woods road next to ck pt to observe it. it was moving in a  wavy like pattern. i saw colored lights and pulsating lights.At that point my friend was concerned it would come where we were and wanted me to come back inside. i scooted it back inside and noticed it was behind a big tree lights still visible. must of watched it another 5-10 mins it just hovered in one spot. then it was gone in a flash.At one point i saw a jet way high in the sky overhead. this object was not a helicopter, plane space station balloon. its movement was definitely nothing of this earth.This encounter lasted a good 25 mins or so.I'm sure of the time because we were just shutting down ck point for the night.When i first noticed it i thought it was a planet.I was in awe when i realized this thing moved like nothing ive ever seen in the northern sky. i became curious and went outside to really see what it was. i became apprehensive because my friend was afraid i could be abducted as has happened in the area awhile back.We shut down  the ck pt lights and all. shut the shades and peeked out through them.The object just left in thin air.I always thought humans an arrogant species thinking there is no alien life but this experience definitely showed me we are not alone. i am thrilled to have experienced this up close. we had i phone but only thought of it after incident.We spoke of our experience and were ridiculed by some and others in the area spoke about their own experiences in sighting ufos i guess we live in an active area for them. people don't report because they don't want to be ridiculed or accept ufos as a given.
content.summary: My friend and i witnessed ufo at allagash ck pt in northern me. it appeared to the left of tree high enough in sky .It would just drop then move to right rapidly then back to left. it would hover and thats when we noticed pulsating colored lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Just after nightfall is a good time to watch for orbiting satellites from my front yard.

i took one of my camp chairs out with me as i often did. my dog began her tour of the yard looking for just the right place to do her evening duty. i set the chair facing east, sat down and began to scan the eastern and overhead sky. it was very pleasant out, clear with a slight chill in the air. i saw a few satellites travel in their usual short track then fade out as they lost light from the sun set over the western horizon. a few commercial aircraft went over and begin their turn toward seatac just south of seattle. 

i looked straight up over me. there was a white light traveling end to end along toward the east. it reminded me of a fluorescent lamp tube shining brightly. one end of the tube flew along as if was the bow, the other end follow along as would the stern. i watched it travel with no alteration at all in its path. for about six seconds there was nothing to block my view. as it traveled along in that time, it seemed to slow and drop down toward the horizon. at six or seven seconds it was behind the tips of the fir trees, perhaps 15 to 20 degrees above horizon, beyond my back yard drifting straight line down toward the heavier burdened limbs of the trees, and it was gone. in relative shape, it would resemble, length and width, as if it were an old fashion wooden one foot school ruler about three to four times as long as the commercial jets i frequently viewed.

the apparent slowing made sense to me if the object had been very high. i listened for sounds of propulsion; there was only silence. i thought there would be a sonic boom; there was no boom. the object must have been very high indeed, high enough to be above the atmosphere. that made the idea that the apparent slowing was due to the higher arc it traveled. as it traveled above me and beyond, its rate of travel was steady.
content.summary: Tubular, white lighted

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 830 pm we came out on our porch for a smoke break and as soon as we walked out the door onto the porch we saw a bright light, it was quiet, and very fast and i know it wasn't a plane or helicopter..It flew in a weird pattern and just disappeared..That's when we started to question what we had just seen and then sure enough another one appeared, but this one was awesome, it danced in the sky, turned a bright orange and pulsated, it gave off an orbe kind of a look, danced around, then just disappeared below some trees in the distance..It was awesome :) we felt like it was a special show just for our eyes only (a girl can dream can't she)
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Smoke break sighting

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend had been watching these star shaped lights at night for probably a year but you can tell they appear closer than the stars and moving slowly but in all directions and the center light appears more like a street light with several different colored lights around it, red, green, blue, violet, but the way they were moving around and changing colors was strange.Reminded us of a chandelear with diferent colors.We counted about 30 one night.We got our hands on a good pair of german made benoculars and my friend wanted me to look at one of the star shaped lights and i still cant believe what we seen, it looked like two spheres of fire, one ring of fire was spinning horizantaly and the other ring of fire was spinning verticaly and inside the rings was a dragons head with eyes of fire sticking his head out nashing his teeth very fast and all around the sphere.If i seen it by myself i would think i was crazy but we both seen it and watched it hoover for a good hour or more.That was probably two years ago but i still see the star-like things moving around at night.
content.summary: Me and friends have seen the star shaped many nights for years, but me and a friend seen a different one shaped like a sphere of fire with a dragons head trying to come out nashing teeth very fast , but hoovering in one spot, unbelievable !

content.detailedDescription: In lubbock tx driving with wife she noticed it first and asked me to look up. the object was far away but looked really big, it looked to be moving fast because of a tail coming off both sides. we watched it go up and disappear for about 20 minutes. the streets were busy but no one seemed to be looking. i did see another picture on klbk tv weather app. the person was also wondering what it was.
content.summary: My wife and i saw a fast moving bright blue object with a tail coming around both sides. it was go if up and disappeared about 20minutes later.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking with a friend on our local bike path. (we have walked together for 5 yrs. we always stargaze and my friend looked up and pointed at a satellite(he's great at spotting them)and just as he was starting to say how fast it was going another one appeared behind the first one. the first one just disappeared as the second one came behind it travelling perhaps 5x the speed of the first one. that one then either disappeared at the same spot as the first one but it really appeared to hook towards the west at a 90 degree turn then disappeared. my friend and i were amazed at the speed of the second one and the fact that they both just vanished. we also felt like the second one was chasing the first. we both just stood there, mouths agape for a few seconds,before we voth realized that we had seen something we had never seen before in all our years walking. i know this sounds like something a person wouldn't do but i personally log between 5 and 10 miles a day, most of the time its anywhere from 1 1/2 to 3 hrs so i know the night skies quite well. happened near the enbd of august or beginning of september 2014.
content.summary: Two stars travelling from end of big dipper headed to nw. first one disappeared second one chased at higher speed than firstt and dissappeared after turning.

content.detailedDescription: On clear nights there are numerous lights in the sky and they are not stars. i take my dog out every night and stand on the porch and gaze at the stars. these are not stars and there are at least 6 or more in the sky every night (when there are is no cloud cover). they are in the same areas every night and may move just a little. i don't know if they are satellites the government has up there spying on us or if they are space ships. basically they don't move but are in slight different locations every night they are visible. i am not the only person who observes these lights in the sky's. i want to know what these blinking lights in the sky are. i hope this will be helpful to your organization. i don't have any photos or footage, all you have to do is come to western pennsylvania and look up. i don't know what size they are but are visible to the naked eye.
content.summary: These are lights in the sky and may move just a little, red, white and green lights

content.detailedDescription:
Hi im peter

i was in glasgow (scotland) couple years ago in 2009. that was my holidays. i made a video from my trenings from there and after public someone on yt spotted weird fast things on skyline behind me.
on video you see me and my "jumps" but in two moments we can spotted fast no sound object moving from the left to rights through the sky.

on video you see me and my "jumps" but in two moments we can spotted fast no sound object moving from the left to rights through the sky
please look in 00:08 sek and 2:10 sek of this video frame by frame.

content.summary: Trening aut side home in good weather in scotland and spotted fast objects on sky (video)

content.detailedDescription: Standing on porch watching sun set, very bright light to the south thought it was a airplane reflecting the suns rays but remained in same spot for over 30 min, and stayed very bright well after sun down looked at it with small telescope, triangle shape with two white lights on top and one red one on bottom connected buy glowing tube, faded out very fast after approx 30min
content.summary: Saw very bright light for aprox 20 min looked at it with binos and saw tringale shape with 2 white lights on top and red one on bottom all conected bay gloeing white light

content.detailedDescription: I was in my driveway when i saw these colored lights flickering like a christmas tree. hovering at times it would move erratically. then i saw another bright object i thought was a star but then it started to move. my batteries in my camera went dead so i called it a night. i don't know how long they stayed there.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Square, round flickering color lights hovering at times speratic movement

content.detailedDescription: Ok here is what happen. a bunch of my friends and some other people have going out to paintball thunder. none of the people have every played paintball befor. this was to be there 1st time every playing paintball and the owner of paintball thunder as we will call him mr c had to play with all of the new people to. so on this one game with all woman mr c had to play with all of them. well at the end of that game there was just mr c and miss s as we will call her left. and as s just shot the last guy on the other team mr c and miss s were very happy and as the pic was taken mr c was just off to her left faceing her looking at her. as you can see she is very happy as her team has just won. great but look in the pic in the sky and what do you see. at the time when the pic was taken there was not a thing in the sky. but when we looked at the pic we could all see what was in the sky. we all only seen it in the pic. and on digital video after the games were over.0
content.summary: Looked like it was black. only seen in pic. no one playing paintball had seen it.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my computer which is by a window. when lights caught my attention. i live on a flight path to local airport and see planes all the time. this moved very differently to planes. it moved from right to left very slowly. at this point i thought may be a helicopter. then it moved upwards a short distance , hovered then fell to earth rapidly. no noise. the lights where very bright green/blue and red. i couldn't say how far away it was but seemed fairly close. the whole thing lasted around 20 seconds in my scope of view as it descended by nearby buildings and lost sight of it. it was certainly not something i have seen before.
content.summary: Green/red/blue bright lights moving slowly over houses then shot downwards out of view

content.detailedDescription: We stepped outside to look at stars.  we had only been outside a few minutes when we saw a largish boomerang shaped object moving without sound southeast.  we live in the city, so it was moving over the city. it was subtle and we would not of noticed it had we not been looking up.  it had a faint orange fizzy glow to it.  it was moving in a strait line very steadily.  we observed it for about 10 seconds before trees and houses obscured it from view.  this occurred at 2253 central time.  we remained outside talking about it and watching the sky.  it then made another appearance at 2301 central time again moving southeast but this time in a more southerly path.  it appeared to be at the same altitude and again was moving silently in a strait path.  we remained outside for about another half hour but did not see it again.
content.summary: Boomerang shaped ufo moving southeast without noise.

content.detailedDescription: I have seen these often in the last 2-3 months but also before over the period of my life span i spoke with some one about the sightings before so i figured i would contact you guys my story is much to indepth to fill up in a report i was hoping for interview with my area branch. i believe i could possibly be a condut to the activity i have always been intouch with the spiritual world for what reason i don't know but i would love to share my story and search for answers with your help i hope to hear from someone very soon.
content.summary: Craft split into 2 pieces
